main.docTitle: Merchant Shipping (Limitation of Shipowners Liability) (Rate of Interest) Order

section.name: s1
section.heading: Rate of interest for purposes of limitation fund
section.leadIn: The rate of interest to be applied for the purposes of paragraph 1 of Article 11 of the Convention on Limitation of Liability for Maritime Claims, 1976 is—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: from 16 January 1987 to 30 April 1987, 7.5%;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: from 1 May 1987 to 5 November 1987, 6%;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: from 6 November 1987 to 5 May 1988, 7.38%;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: from 6 May 1988 to 5 October 1989, 5.89%;

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.content: from 6 October 1989 to 14 June 1990, 11.09%;

paragraph.name: f
paragraph.content: from 15 June 1990 to 25 July 1991, 10.24%;

paragraph.name: g
paragraph.content: from 26 July 1991 to 30 April 1992, 9.74%;

paragraph.name: h
paragraph.content: from 1 May 1992 to 22 October 1992, 8.72%;

paragraph.name: i
paragraph.content: from 23 October 1992 to 27 July 1995, 7.48%;

paragraph.name: j
paragraph.content: from 28 July 1995 to 11 June 1998, 8.82%;

paragraph.name: k
paragraph.content: from 12 June 1998 to 30 May 2002, 9.91%;

paragraph.name: l
paragraph.content: from 31 May 2002 to 17 November 2005, 5.16%; (L.N. 203 of 2005)

paragraph.name: m
paragraph.content: from 18 November 2005 to 23 February 2006, 6.55%; (L.N. 203 of 2005; L.N. 27 of 2006)

paragraph.name: n
paragraph.content: from 24 February 2006 to 31 August 2006, 7.38%; (L.N. 27 of 2006; L.N. 184 of 2006)

paragraph.name: o
paragraph.content: from 1 September 2006 to 27 December 2007, 7.96%; (L.N. 184 of 2006; L.N. 242 of 2007)

paragraph.name: p
paragraph.content: from 28 December 2007 to 13 March 2008, 7.45%; (L.N. 242 of 2007; L.N. 56 of 2008)

paragraph.name: s
paragraph.content: from 12 December 2008 onwards, 5.2%. (L.N. 261 of 2008)
